name: kinetic-forged-fitness
description: Kinetic Forged Fitness is an intelligent fitness partner that forges personalized workout plans to build your momentum and help you achieve your goals.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && esbuild index.tsx --bundle --outfile=dist/bundle.js --loader:.tsx=tsx && cp index.html dist/index.html && cp index.css dist/index.css
